entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.8°C

Humidity: 74 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning late in the morning then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
